books.author: by Mark Greaney
books.description: The ninth book in the Gray Man series. Court Gentry tries to stop the head of a group trafficking women and children.
books.name: ONE MINUTE OUT

books.author: by Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.
books.name: AMERICAN DIRT

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Lisa Kleypas
books.description: The sixth book in the Ravenels series. Cassandra teaches a railway magnate a lesson.
books.name: CHASING CASSANDRA

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by J.D. Robb
books.description: The 50th book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas seeks the sender of packages that give off toxic airborne fumes.
books.name: GOLDEN IN DEATH

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: A sibling relationship is impacted when the family goes from poverty to wealth and back again over the course of many decades.
books.name: THE DUTCH HOUSE

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: In Depression-era Kentucky, five women refuse to be cowed by men or convention as they deliver books.
books.name: THE GIVER OF STARS

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Cullen Post, a lawyer and Episcopal minister, antagonizes some ruthless killers when he takes on a wrongful conviction case.
books.name: THE GUARDIANS

books.author: by Mary Kubica
books.description: A Chicago couple becomes unsettled when they move to an old house in Maine and their new neighbor turns up dead.
books.name: THE OTHER MRS.

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A detective investigates a seemingly wholesome member of the community when an 11-year-old boy’s body is found.
books.name: THE OUTSIDER

books.author: by Kiley Reid
books.description: Tumult ensues when Alix Chamberlain’s babysitter is mistakenly accused of kidnapping her charge.
books.name: SUCH A FUN AGE

books.author: by Isabel Allende
books.description: A young pregnant widow and an Army doctor take a ship to Chile to escape the aftermath of the Spanish Civil War.
books.name: A LONG PETAL OF THE SEA
